website_summaries.verdict: An elegant design with a blue knit cover, these wide-mouth bottles retain heat well and are easy to use.
pros: Lids close tightly to prevent leaks
Great size, and wide mouth for easy pouring
It has a transparent cover and is very durable
Comfortable to use on the body
Works as an ice pack and cold water bottle, as well
cons: Gives off a strong odor of rubber
Thickness has been an issue with transferring heat

customer_reviews.title: Two liter is lie
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product and its quality. Advertisement says "Attmu Classic Rubber Transparent Hot Water Bottle 2 Liter with Knit Cover ", but the bottle is not 2 liter. I measured it and it holds only 1300 ml, a little more than one liter.
customer_reviews.author: S. Poudel

customer_reviews.title: Sorry, but it leaks
customer_reviews.text: It's very pretty, it's clear and it's cheap. I thought I could save money by buying this instead of one of the expensive German brand. I use hot water bottles on a daily basis. Unfortunately, this one has leaked on several occasions, not always and I don't know why as I always make sure that the stopper is properly closed. The expensive hot water bottles that I bought in the past have lasted for years with no leaking issues whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: djaybx

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: First time using this product and it tore from the bottom and got warped when I added hot water. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lara Anna Armani

customer_reviews.title: Should be called The Teeny Bit Warm Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This is much more attractive than my old red rubber bottle, but this material seems to prevent heat transfer. It would be great for a protective heat barrier under hot items, but it is terrible for a hot water bottle. I think I would probably have to fill it with boiling water to get any benefit,,,,and that process would be beyond risky. If you use the sweater cover, you will feel no heat whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: lizE

customer_reviews.title: It’s not safe to use.
customer_reviews.text: I was happy with this product. it was good at beginning, after used it a few times. The water come out in a tiny hole. Very dangerous and unsafe. By the way, I am always using same warm temperature water and never filled it more than 2/3.
customer_reviews.author: Bin Luo

customer_reviews.title: Best on the market
customer_reviews.text: Well-made, smooth,sturdy, and comfortable without that annoying ridge around the edges that other brands have. It may be the thickness, but as other reviewers noted, even the hottest tap water inside produces only medium heat on the outside. I put hot water in it and let it sit for a couple of minutes to warm up the bottle, then poured that out and refilled it with hot water, and that helped. Of all the available hot water bottles currently on the market, this one is the best.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Too thick to get hot? I'll never use it.
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty, and the sweater is nice, but it just does not get very warm because the plastic is too thick, or something. I put in pretty dang hot water. Maybe it would work if I added *actually boiling* water like it says not to, but I'm not going to try that. edit: It's so never-hot, I haven't found use for it once. After I FINALLY got it to dry out, it now lives in a drawer. Maybe I can cut holes in the sweater and give it to a tiny dog.
customer_reviews.author: Icantdecide

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but came without the cozy
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a family member who was sick and tends to run cold. Its a great product - leak proof, big(ish) mouth allows you to fill up easily, and it is strong and has no unpleasant door. No odd rubber smell, and the water is still drinkable even after being in the bag for a few days. That said, my delivery came without a cozy which was frustrating, because it can be really hot particularly in the beginning, and it loses heat quickly as a result. Still I recommend this. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: maddox

customer_reviews.title: I liked it. Very good in terms of usage and ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it. Very good in terms of usage and size (its dimensions is almost like my iPad Air's). Recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Caner

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, no complaints
customer_reviews.text: I'm English so abundantly qualified to comment on hot water bottles, ha. I really like this one. The plastic feels a bit less flexible and also more durable than rubber (it's still soft, and softens up with the first couple of uses). The quality seems excellent. Be careful the first time you use as the two sides of mine were stuck together, and I could easily have burned myself filling it with hot water. You need to go gently and kind of wiggle it to separate the two sides.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Don't leak, "sweater" is nice
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these hot water bottles. Have used in bed at our unheated cabin on multiple occasions. They don't leak and stay warm for a long time. Pro tip: peel down the sweater about halfway so that you can see the hot water level as you fill. Also, when first sealed it sometimes seems like they leak a few drops, but I think it's just water squeezed out of the screws by the lid, because it doesn't continue.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Relief is here!
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were microwaveable but other then that it does what it has to. I just boil some water then let it cool a few minutes and pour it in with a funnel. I take off the knitted cloth because my back pain is always that bad that the direct heat seriously helps rather then burns. After you fill it up with boiling water safely, it should last about 30 minutes then the heat starts losing its strength to help your aches, pains, cramps or what it may be. I say this is the best investment I made this year and am probably going to buy another one to cover my upper back as well.
customer_reviews.author: Preshes

customer_reviews.title: Like the good old hot water bottles from my youth, but better!
customer_reviews.text: I introduced my American girlfriend to the awesomeness that is a hot water bottle on cold winter nights. She looooves it, always asking to heat up the "hot water thing". This product is actually a lot better than the hot water bottles I'm used to. Some will sometimes spurt hot water out when you're trying to fill them up, often burning your hand. But this one somehow doesn't do that, don't know if it's the material, but haven't come close to burning myself. I might have to buy another one 'cause my girlfriend keeps hogging it!!
customer_reviews.author: Jay L.

customer_reviews.title: Good but careful not to burn your hands!
customer_reviews.text: It warms my bed at night before I climb in which is great, exactly what I need it for. I love that it's two layers so I can take off the knit once it's less warm. No leakage when I wake up in the morning - how great is that! One important thing to note, be careful when you pour hot water in it because it may spill and burn your hands! The bottle looks bigger than it is so you really need to watch out and for this reason I am giving it 3 stars instead of 5; safety is important.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Cheap-- Mine leaked on first use
customer_reviews.text: I would skip this one, mine leaked on first use but thankfully not until the water had cooled or that would have been disastrous. It's cheap and it shows.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for cold weather camping!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these water bottles for our camping trip, 1 for our kids to share and 1 for my husband and I to share. We heated the water over the fire right before bed and put it in the sleeping bag. We camped in 26 degree weather, with snow..the bottles were still warm in the morning! 10 hours later! These will definitely go with us every camp trip!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Nice option to heating up the whole house
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even know they made hot water bottles anymore. Seems like such an old fashioned notion but they knew what they were doing back when. Bought one bottle for my wife as her feet are often cold at night and it works like a charm. My son liked it so much as he was borrowing it a lot so she bought one for him. There hasn't been any leaking so we're not worried about that. The bottles are so well insulated that if they're kept under the covers there might even be some warmth that can be felt after 24 hours. My wife heats up about 6 cups of water in the microwave to fill them up.
customer_reviews.author: KJ in SD

customer_reviews.title: Cure for PMS and Backaches
customer_reviews.text: I always overlooked hot water bottles as archaic but I saw the beautiful knit design and definitely wanted to try this out since I have debilitating menstrual cramps that keeping me balled up in tears for hours...NO MORE...I lay comfortably with this on my stomach and I can get through the pain with ease, I sleep easier too and this water bottle keeps heat in throughout the night and because you can remove the cute knit pouch its easy to clean, very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: I've rinsed it and had it sit out in the sun for a few days and it's better but is going to take a while for it ...
customer_reviews.text: Update- I did get the smell out, which was what I didn't like, so I'm updating my review from 3 to 4 stars. I got the green color, im using it for neck and shoulder pain. It holds the heat for longer than I expected but you do need to be careful about wrapping it in a towel or something. The only thing I don't like- there's a strong chemical/ plastic smell that really hits you out of the bag. I've rinsed it and had it sit out in the sun for a few days and it's better but is going to take a while for it to completely dissipate.
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah James

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t come with clear directions!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this three stars for two reasons. First, it came with no directions so we were unsure if it was safe to put in the microwave to heat up or what. Ended up using my electric kettle to heat the water and pouring it in. Second issue was it was wayyyy too hot! Like burnt my stomach hot. Even with the sweater I had to put a towel under it. Worked as it should just confusing for a first time user with no directions!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: A life necessity
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these. So much that I now have three. I got it for shark week but I find myself using it constantly now. I put it under the covers before I go to bed and now the husband tries to steal it from me. It’s so comforting! I purchased them for my kids for their beds also and they love them. I reuse the water and will add in a splash of vinegar just to be sure nothing funky is growing in it. It can get really hot at first but no one has burned themselves because of the great little sweater around it.
customer_reviews.author: Kylene Blackford

customer_reviews.title: Must have for cold winter nights.
customer_reviews.text: I use hot water bottles to warm by bed in winter. I can't stand having cold feet or feeling chilled in bed in winter, and hot water bottles are a safer, more economical (no electricity) way to keep warm. I'll pop it into the bed about 5 minutes before I turn in, then push it to the foot so my feet keep warm. I love the little sweater, although I haven't even used it yet. If you found my review to be useful, please let me know by clicking the “Yes” or “Helpful” button. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke G.

customer_reviews.title: This helps me with pain relief
customer_reviews.text: This helps me with pelvic pain and cramps, or just when my stomach hurts. I just pop it into the microwave for a few minutes (check your power level first!) and then for hours, you can relax and get so much relief from heat therapy. It's very comfy. One time, I accidentally sat on it, and it didn't break, so this rubber is super thick and durable; it's not going to break.
customer_reviews.author: Savana H

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to stay warm- It is Socal but it can get cold. I remembered how we used hot rubber water bottles to keep ourselves warm in Europe. So I bought it and my wife loves it- It is very easy to set up just get my electric kettle make sure it boils. Put the boiling water put the cover and done- It stays warm for 6-7 hours. My wife loves it. The product has a strong plastic smell but it will go away I think. The cover is cheap but it is ok. You can just wrap it using towels- Overalll, great product just hope the smell goes away-
customer_reviews.author: P. Kim

customer_reviews.title: It works.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased two of these bottles and use them, almost, daily. Winter in Chicagoland area gets a bit cold, these hot water bottles provide hours of comfortable warmth. Surprisingly I just started using the water bottles as a cold pack and, low and behold, just as effective when cold treatment is preferred. If you are even considering, follow through with the purchase as you will not be disappointed. There is a slight plastic smell on arrival, but it dissipates quickly. The items arrived in a timely fashion and exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packaged & disappointing material.
customer_reviews.text: I was dissatisfied with my purchase of the hot water bottle. It came without instruction, or labeling - just the rubber bottle and a knit cover (no washing instructions, no fabric description/identification) alone in a large box. I am dissatisfied with this seller. Further, the knit cover is too thick -it is not soft and it doesn't conduct/distribute the heat very efficiently. I wouldn't purchase this product again.
customer_reviews.author: neatone

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: This works great for back cramps. Since there is nothing to plug in it’s very safe. It’s easy to use. Just fill with hot water. The little sweater is cute but I couldn’t properly feel the heat, so I use something thinner. It holds heat for a good long time. It doesn’t leak and I’ve been using it for a few months. The only thing is I wish it was longer to address a larger area for the pain. You do have to fill it with very hot water to make it last long. But I do like it and recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Love2Read

customer_reviews.title: Warm warm on my tum tum
customer_reviews.text: Easily microwavable or using water from a teapot, and holds its temperature for a while, the knit bag helps to not let you get burned. PSA for Boyfriends/Husbands: Great for cramps
customer_reviews.author: Sir Ixxy

customer_reviews.title: Seems cheap
customer_reviews.text: The plastic bottle seemed cheap but did hold up. Not sure it will last the years, as it seemed on the lower quality side. The sweater for it was very poor and seemed like just a way to upsell the plastic. The product said not to boil water for it (too hot). Ok, fine with me. I used the microwave and put very hot water in instead, but the heat did not transfer well. I tried this a few times, but I'm going back to my old hot water bottle instead.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie

customer_reviews.title: it keeps me warm
customer_reviews.text: Great Product! Help me go to sleep every night during winter and warm my cold feet. Love the knit sweater cover, it resist temperature when water is too hot, and keep bottle warm when water cold down. There is little smell because made of rubber? things, but it's okay because the smell is not strong. After several times of use it, the smell of rubber is very little. I have to say this product can keep water hot about 3 or 4 hours? after that I go to sleep so cannot measure. Love this and use it almost daily.
customer_reviews.author: Ling C

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly Functioning Water Bottle
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is nice and durable, and the little sweater around it is extremely convenient. No more scalded back whenever a towel slips. It stays hot for quiet a while and, whenever it seems to go cold, you can just take the little sweater off and put it directly on you.
customer_reviews.author: D.Chap

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality, and Adorable1
customer_reviews.text: We wanted the hot water bottles to use as a way to warm our feet in bed at night. Husband had back surgery and sleeps in a hospital bed for now....I, Wife, sleep nearby on a futon. The hot water bottle is fine, but in their little knitted sweaters, they are, to quote everyone who sees them "the cutest things ever !!" We have no problems whatever with the quality, design, etc. of the bottles... they seem to be sturdy enough to last quite awhile.... besides just being so cute !
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect temperature, easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my boyfriend who recently had a back injury occur. It’s so painful that he’s constantly in cold sweat and his doctor said his blood pressure rose from the constant pain. He said this hot pack saved his life! It doesn’t make the pain go away completely, but that his back feels much better after using it. It’s easy to fill- I just lean it slightly against the side of the sink and pour in the hot water there. The little sweater is super cute too. :) and the pack is the perfect temperature after the sweater is on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Toasty!
customer_reviews.text: This stays warm and does not leak. I did have to put boiling water in it because the tap water was not warm enough. Then I had to put the sweater on it, because the bottle was too hot! I have a counter top kettle that boils water very quickly. It also has a pour spout, so this is no trouble for me. The final result was just what I was looking for, so 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: BL

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Looks and works as it should. I put hot water in and microwave it for 5 mins. Then I put the sweater on And this preserves the heat and keeps it from burning when it’s that hot. That way, when heat reduces, you can remove the sweater. This makes it easier to use for long hours without refilling (Like at night) Tip: only fill about 3/4 of the bottle and push out the remaining air to make it easier to lie on (for lower back) or have it on your lower tummy without it being too heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Zeph

customer_reviews.title: Maybe the blue is better?
customer_reviews.text: Seeing the other reviews I must have got a good one? It’s not the quality of my German ones but I needed an extra to take with me, ironically for travel, until my next Germany trip. I use water straight from my kettle, obviously don’t pour too quickly because the fill rate can be unpredictable. Stays warm. Great for back and hips, or just to snuggle with for core warmth. I add a few drops of witch hazel to keep the bottle fresh.
customer_reviews.author: S313

customer_reviews.title: Cute hot water bottle with turtle neck sweater cover
customer_reviews.text: Needed to replace my elderly hot water bottle and did so with this great transparent hot water bottle with it's own turtle neck sweater cover. I actually purchased two and they are great, especially after a long day at whatever you do, put it behind your neck and rest your head on it while watching your favorite TV program or just hug it for a bit of extra warmth.
customer_reviews.author: Judith R Bodily

customer_reviews.title: so perfect for children
customer_reviews.text: This is a smaller size hot water bottle, so perfect for children. I would recommend a larger one for an adult. As far as the quality of the product... It's okay. I'm happy enough with it, but I don't know that I would purchase again. Its not as 'sturdy' as some I've had in the past, however, it seals well and I have experienced no leaks thus far. The fact that it comes with a cover is a bonus. The cover is very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: hot water bottle
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one because it had the most positive reviews. They may all be like this one I don't know. It is very pretty if that is what you are looking for in a hot water bottle. Description said Classic Rubber. It is plastic, not rubber. At least not the rubber hot water bottles we had a kids. It is not soft. It is rather hard. But they just may not make them like they used to.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: Hasn't leaked In 8 Months
customer_reviews.text: We previously used the old style, red hot water bottles that would eventually leak, but that's not the case with this hot water bottle. We recently purchased another two bottles of this style. We are very satisfied with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Ewing

customer_reviews.title: Looks Nice, Made Nice - Doesn’t Let Warmth Through
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is made well and comes with a cute little “seearer” to put over it to make it feel cozy against the skin. However, it just does not seem to let heat through like a good, old-fashioned rubber type water bottle. The plug fits well and itnis translucent so you can easily see how much water you’ve added. It is not overly flexible, which is an annoyance if you want to fill it frim a shallow sink, likenin a bathroom. I was disappointed as you just can’t feel much warmth through it.
customer_reviews.author: B. Colonna

customer_reviews.title: Stays Heated For A Long Time
customer_reviews.text: This is a great heated water bottle. I tried several variations of heating pads including electrical and chemical heating pads and I found that they did not heat up high enough or did not stay heated long enough. This was the perfect alternative. You fill the rubber bottle up with boiling water, and I found that it stays hot for quite awhile. Mine stayed noticeably hot for over an hour. The bottle is also fairly large which is a benefit as well (photo for reference).
customer_reviews.author: Meredith & Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought to keep a calf warm during a cold snap - but boyfriend loves it warmed up and thrown in our bed. Our only source of heat is a wood stove so it was easy to heat up water in a kettle and pour it into the hot water bottle. Stays hot for a long time (I fall asleep within 2 hours but it’s definitely still very hot at that time). Plastic feels thick and the cozy is helpful so you don’t get burned.
customer_reviews.author: Kaila Loff

customer_reviews.title: Good quality hot water bottle !!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this purchase. Good heating pad for back pain and sore muscles. Holds heat longer than traditional bottles Easy to carry around Transparent and we can see the water level in the bottle Bottle cover control the heat transfer It has good grip, it wont slip away So far happy with this product..Highly recommended !!!
customer_reviews.author: Aanne

customer_reviews.title: Seems perfect to me
customer_reviews.text: I haven't bought one in years, but when I was at my vacation home and caught a bad cold i looked for one and found this! It is made of thick material so I think it will be very durable. It has a cute blue "turtleneck sweater" covering it. With the sweater on, it was just nice and warm feeling, like you'd use to warm up your feet in bed. When I wanted more heat I took it off. I find it to be just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Desert rat

customer_reviews.title: Leaks after 60 days
customer_reviews.text: Buy another product. This one starts leaking within 45-60 days.
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: Love the water bottles
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Midwest. Also, I had a day at work where the heat was not on and I was freezing. I got the bottles (one for work and one for my apartment) I have used the bottle was work and put it between my legs while I am on the phone. At home I put the bottle between my legs in bed. I recommend the purchase. They will keep you warm in cold weather.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Louise Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Works Really Well!
customer_reviews.text: The water bottle is a good size and keeps the water warm for basically the whole day. The knit cover makes it so that it doesn’t burn and I also have not experienced any leaks. It’s really nice to use this when experiencing cramps which is what I got it for. The only complaint of mine would be how the plastic seems to permanently bend at the top but it doesn’t shrink or anything (thankfully). Also, I have bought a water jug before and the plastic just seemed like much better quality than this one (thicker and sturdier) so I was kinda disappointed. Overall though, it gets the job done effectively so it was still a pretty great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Lin

customer_reviews.title: This one still going after 1 winter, but my other rubber one broke.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this water bottle in Nov 2015 for the winter. It works fine, no smell, cool green color, stays warm and flexible, no issues filling, good screw cap, even without any metal, no leakage, good size (standard). In comparison a different rubber water bottle bought at the same time, when we got it out this week, broke open. It seems the rubber weakened and/or deteriorated. I've replaced that one by buying another one of these (in blue this time as that's the only color offering).
customer_reviews.author: SuperDad2211

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife and she loves it. Unlike other products out there, this comes with a knit cover which is the best part about it. The previous product I had, once hot water was poured in it, she had to let it cool off a bit so that the heat would not effect her skin. With the knit cover this product comes with, she does not have to wait and the water stays hot/warm longer.
customer_reviews.author: aaryal

customer_reviews.title: Great for heating a bed or feet in the winter
customer_reviews.text: I live in the Northeast and use hot water bottles to heat beds in the winter. Also my two boys (7 & 10) each sleep with one so they stay toasty and I can turn the heat down. This hot water bottle is exactly what I needed. The sweater fits perfectly and seems durable. Though I have not used that since I am not putting this directly on skin.
customer_reviews.author: Stacey St John

customer_reviews.title: Love these - own four
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased two, came back for two more when the originals were "adopted" by other family members. These bottles are great, love the colors (not that it matters for functionality, but the colors are fun). The outer covers are acryllic and pill very quickly, so they don't look very nice after a few uses, but otherwise these are great. Have used the first set for a year and no issues with leaking at all. I fill with boiling water from an electric kettle and they keep the bed warm for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Leaks
customer_reviews.text: I pulled it out of the package, put some boiling water in it, put it on the sofa and put my wife's feet on it to warm her feet up, while putting it between my knees (in a resting position, not squeezing between my knees). Shortly afterwards I felt something stinging my knees. I thought it was my knee touching the bare plastic and that there was a hole in the knitting. Turns out the bottle was leaking at the neck where everyone else has been having the same leak issue. I'll keep it because I like the knit that covers it, but I'll buy a good sturdy bottle to replace it and use the knit for that.
customer_reviews.author: Derek Steven Powell

customer_reviews.title: Leaks out the top
customer_reviews.text: The bottle holds heat very well, but it leaks at the top--not where the plug screws in, but around the fitting that holds the plug. If it's tipped at an angle it's a slow drip, but if I shift position and accidentally squeeze it a little, water comes flowing out the top (and it is not overfilled--I followed instructions!). With this leak it's not usable unless you want to sit very still holding the bottle completely upright. Sitting here in a wet shirt and feeling bad for my husband, who purchased this for me as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Helena

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but I wish the sweater covering had a zipper at the bottom for easy removal and install.
customer_reviews.text: Not bad but I which the sweater covering had a zipper for easy removal. I wanted to remove the sweater cover prior to filling in case I spilled water but it was difficult to remove empty and would be impossible to put on once you filled the bottle. A nylon zipper at the bottom could fix this problem
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I like to sleep in a cold room because of my sinuses, but sometimes I can't keep my feet warm. I tuck this at the foot of the bed and it stays pleasantly warm all night and the water doesn't need to be very hot at all when you fill it. I highly recommend it for anyone who needs to keep warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Attmu green hot water bottle with knit cover
customer_reviews.text: This is just like the hot water bottles I remember as a child, only better because you can see inside. Both my children and I have used it, as a cold pack with crushed ice for headaches, and a hot pack for tummy aches. It retains temperature for several hours. I have only used hot tap water so far, not boiling. I like the grey knit cover that came with it as well.
customer_reviews.author: Donna O.

customer_reviews.title: Do not waste $ on electric heating pads
customer_reviews.text: I need this for cramps. No electric heating pad can get as hot as a water bottle filled with hot water & even if my skin stays red for a day afterwards, I don't feel any discomfort on my skin. I normally put it in a pillowcase but the knitted cover will protect you from the type of skin redness I'm talking about.
customer_reviews.author: colleen

customer_reviews.title: This thing is as cute as it is effective
customer_reviews.text: This water bottle is as cute as it is effective and a must have in every hall closet. I wish I'd bought one YEARS ago. I fill mine halfway to 2/3 up with steaming hot water from the tap and keep it close for monthly lady aches. It keeps its heat for hours. Be sure to remove the adorable sweater cover when you fill/refill to keep it from getting wet and allow the bottle to fully dry before storing,
customer_reviews.author: Sarah T

customer_reviews.title: The water bottle is made of thick rubber material and feels like it will last a long time
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly (prime 2 day shipping) and I was very excited to use it! The water bottle is made of thick rubber material and feels like it will last a long time. The knitted "sweater" it comes with fits the water bottle snugly and allows optimal heat transfer, without hot rubber burning the skin. The first time I filled it, water spilled out a bit because the rubber on the inside was almost vacuum sealed together. No issues, just took a little bit longer to fill the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlin

customer_reviews.title: I love this
customer_reviews.text: No problem with leaking that others reported - there is a tendency for a little water to get trapped in the filler collar when filling, but it's easily dumped out. I might even get a second one - it's way more effective than electric heating pads. Wish I had bought it much sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Haemmerle

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for cold camping
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for camping in the cold. The coldest night was about 13 degrees and this was my best friend that night. I filled with just boiling water and placed it in my sleeping bag with me and would shift this around from chest to legs to feet. With the cloth cover it wasn't hot, but very warm to the touch, It would still be warm in the morning about 7 or 8 hours later.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher

customer_reviews.title: Cute hot water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I love the adorable little sweater that comes with this water bottle. I haven't had any leaking issues. I just feel like the bottle material is maybe so thick that you don't feel 100% of the heat of the water. It is definitely better than using a literal bottle of hot water to deal with cramps like I had been before this purchase. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: mariah

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm!!
customer_reviews.text: We went tent camping for a extended weekend. I tend to get really cold in the middle of the night even though I have thermals on and a big warm sleeping bag (not the mummy ones because I get claustrophobic in those). Our temps were gonna be in the 30's so I bought this because using electric heat scares me in a tent. It was wonderful. I boiled water on the fire then put in in my sleeping bag about 30 min before I knew I would be be going to bed. It felt great!! And I loved the sweater cover, so soft and warm.
customer_reviews.author: CG

customer_reviews.title: Smelly plastic but it works
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this is not BPA free. I emailed to ask but never received an answer. The plastic smells pretty bad but it works as needed so... The sweater is easy enough to remove & put back on for cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: shilbert

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product. The rubber is tough and strong, which enough to handle extreme heat. I have been using this by filling it up with boiled hot water, and the rubber was able to withstand the heat. In addition, the heat also transferred very well through the rubber.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: A weird little thing
customer_reviews.text: This has a cute little design, but it's not good for much. It arrived as a small-sized water bottle with a knitted turtle neck sweater on it. I filled it with hot water, put it at my feet in my cold bed, and crawled in. The turtle neck sweater soon came off because the heat couldn't get through, but the bottle itself was small and rough feeling, and I soon threw it out of the bed because it was more an impediment to sleep than a help. It's been in my cupboard ever since, and I will probably try to sell it in a garage sale.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Kleiner

customer_reviews.title: I wish I would've purchased this excellent product years ago
customer_reviews.text: Moist heat is much more effective than dry heat when applied to achy muscles. I wish I would've purchased this excellent product years ago. Perfect for long commutes or sleeping with. The bag stays hot all night long. Your body will thank you with no additional cost to your utility bill. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: James Liam

customer_reviews.title: To Date Best Hot Water Bottles I've Purchased Over The Years
customer_reviews.text: I've waited over one year to write a review for this product. Fully rubber hot water bottles are very risky to use. I've had numerous bottles burst a the seams. I'm reluctant to say "Leak Proof", but for over a year that's the case. Not sure what I think are composite materials are, but it works thus far. My primary use is keeping everyone warm under the covers when sleeping and preventing the need to turn on the furnace to run all night. Or, put one under a blanket when reading on cold days. I highly recommend this brand and product.
customer_reviews.author: DL Harris

customer_reviews.title: Right choice
customer_reviews.text: Durable, leak proof. I heat up water in my electric kettle and fill the bottle. So far I’ve used it for back/neck pain, cramps, and bed warmer for my cat. Love the little sweater cover, makes it very cozy. Haven’t tried to take it off and wash it yet, hoping that is a thing.
customer_reviews.author: Katie T

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had to give up our heated mattress pad after learning we were essentially radiating ourselves every night. I purchased 2 of these and fill them with boiling water every night and they keep under the covers nice and warm. Not even missing my mattress pad except for convenience! These are great!
customer_reviews.author: BDLAV30

customer_reviews.title: Withstood Kosovar Winter
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these when I joined the Peace Corps and moved to Kosovo, where they have harsh winters and only the rich have central heating. They worked really well and never popped or broke. I even poured boiling water in them (which you aren't supposed to) and they worked most of the night! I bought another when I returned home to America because they are so handy!
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Wills

customer_reviews.title: comfort in time of need.
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased this to comfort my dying dog and to ease his pain. Unfortunately he passed away before it arrived. It is easing my pain now. I need something warm to hug. The little sweater is very cute and I'll probably use it if I get the bottle too hot but for now I'm using the bottle without it. I like the color and the fact that it's transparent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality. It leaks through the cap
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality. It leaks through the cap. I bought two the same day from the same seller. I could return the other one, but it says "not eligible for return" on this one, which makes no sense. Be wary of buying this product and/or from this seller!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Eliason

customer_reviews.title: Does its job!
customer_reviews.text: This works really well and it's a really big! I have to fill my electric kettle up all the way to fill this puppy up. It retains heat for a few hours, and if you use very hot water like me, you will definitely need to wrap this in a cloth or cover. I really like that this is translucent because I can easily see how full it is. My only complaint is that the rubber feels plastic-like, and it will stick to my skin. However, when you use a cloth, that is a non-issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Good construction and fun design
customer_reviews.text: I bought the purple one and the color is very pretty and the transparency of the material is fun. I've been using it for a couple months now as a foot/leg warmer in the bed at night and the construction has held up with no leakage. I think the thickness of the rubber is just right so it warms quickly but isn't too hot. I don't use the hot water bottle with the little sweater but it's cute too. This product was as expected and hasn't let me down yet!
customer_reviews.author: JrDarth1

customer_reviews.title: The best hot water bottle
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased many hot water bottles and this one is the best. I've bought mine 1 year ago and I use it often. I have not had any problems with it or any leaking. Lots of them are just junk and leak right away. This one is the best one I have ever purchased and so far after a year no problems with it. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: W Lind

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: I love the unique Blue transparent color and the matching blue knitted cover. I ordered this for my mom as a replacement for a Red hot water bottle that was leaking. She says that the quality of plastic is lightweight but durable. She loves these features! What a great find. I will look for more products from this vendor.
customer_reviews.author: Myra Davis-Alston

customer_reviews.title: Retains heat well, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: It is good quality and holds heat for a fairly long time. I don't put boiling water into it because I'm always skeptical about new products, but I do heat water up on the stove to get nice and hot before I pour it in. I recommend keeping its little sweater on at all times because it is too hot for the skin otherwise. I love this product! I noticed a ton of bad reviews, and what I really recommend is reading the description really well before purchasing. I would not recommend this for children. Great for adults with cold or achy parts!
customer_reviews.author: Johanna

customer_reviews.title: doesn't get hot, even with boiling water- it's a WARM waterbottle
customer_reviews.text: nice color. the cover is cute, but unnecessary, as this bottle never gets all that hot because of whatever the material is, even with nearly boiling water. HOWEVER, it is excellent for putting in a pet carrier to transport a small pet on a cold day, and it's cover makes it extra cozy.
customer_reviews.author: nettle bones

customer_reviews.title: does what need so far
customer_reviews.text: Only used like twice, but held up and don't seem much to say, the exterior cover is little flimsy in general, but it was cheaper to get with , and more handy than grabbing a towel to wrap. so still glad i got with cover.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. Pretty colors. 2nd one as a gift
customer_reviews.text: It’s a very solid (good quality) hot water bottle. I think is safe. Is good quality. The colors of the water bag and the cover are beautiful. I already bought a second one as a gift. It arrived quickly. Updated: great product. I feel very safe with it. Half the price in Walmart but this is nicer and arrived fast.
customer_reviews.author: CarolaD

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but hard to get it "hot"
customer_reviews.text: This is a very durable water bottle. The material is pliable and quite thick. However, even with boiling water in it, it doesn't get "hot" - I would say it achieves a lukewarm temperature. The knitted cover adds a nice look.
customer_reviews.author: AnnaM

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I bought one of these in blue a few years back and use it every night for pain relief. I freeze it and have never had an issue, so I bought a purple one for travel. Have not tried hot water and it should work the same.
customer_reviews.author: SiriusReviewer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bottle
customer_reviews.text: I fill with near boiling water and use it without the cover. Some Like It Hot. It retains heat throughout the night and even has some warmth the next morning. The plastic material seems to be strong and durable, though I have used it for only 3 months -- so far, so good. Am very pleased with this item.
customer_reviews.author: Rinkaanaa

customer_reviews.title: It just works!
customer_reviews.text: I received my water bottle next day with prime membership which is awesome! Mine came with the vanilla sweater sleeve and fit the bottle snuggly. I used boiling hot water in the bottle to test its durability and it held up very well. I will be using this for my back pain. Mine did not come with mold as others have experienced. Just a clear see-through plastic bottle and a nicely stitched vanilla colored sweater.
customer_reviews.author: kennyg

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Cr@p 😒
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this was true to it’s advertised word; an authentic RUBBER hot water bottle—- sadly, it is a thick PLASTIC bottle that does a poor job radiating any substantial amount of heat. And it cools in record time—- hence the knitted sleeve, which I dislike as well.
customer_reviews.author: GemLvr

customer_reviews.title: Hot water bottle in a fancy turtleneck? Yes please!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my sister-in-law at Christmas, because the only thing better than snuggling up when it snows is snuggling up with a hot water bottle when it snows. I can't speak to its abilities, but the knit material was thick and lush and the water bottle seemed appropriately flexible.
customer_reviews.author: Elle Park

customer_reviews.title: it's ok, but not like the red one we had
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a replacement for an old red water bottle that we had from way back. The rubber on this one isn't as soft, and it seems like it doesn't hold heat as long - might be a bit smaller than our original. I don't know if there is anything magic about red, but next time, that's the way we'll go.
customer_reviews.author: another reader

customer_reviews.title: OK but...
customer_reviews.text: Although hot water bottle is made of Thermoplastic (to hold heat longer than rubber), I found it lost heat quickly. Also there is no hole at the bottom of the bag for hanging it upside down for storage. Since it is transparent you can see that it doesn't get dry inside. However, there is no rubber smell. Bottle is extremely flexible even when full--for me that was a minus, but it might be a plus for some.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy M

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite!
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge fan of hot water bottles. They are perfect not just to heat you up on a cold day, but also for various forms of pain relief. I have been buying this brand for years now, and I absolutely love them. They hold a lot of water in comparison to most other hot water bottles I have come across, and I have yet to experience any kind of leak. I heat up the water right before I go to bed, and it is still lukewarm in the morning when I wake up. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Jess R

customer_reviews.title: High quality, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wished, very high quality. Holds heat for quite some time. Easy to fill. And LEAK PROOF. I highly recommend this product. If you're in need of heat to help with pain, this is what will help.
customer_reviews.author: Parker Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great on chilly nights
customer_reviews.text: A well-designed, sturdy product. I use it to keep my feet warm as I'm falling asleep on chilly nights.The clear plastic allows you to see how full the bottle is as you're adding hot water. The large mouth prevents splatters as you're filling or emptying the bag. When filled with near boiling water, it retains heat for about 8 hours. With hot tap water the heat dissipates after a couple of hours. I wish it were somewhat larger, but now I understand why most people buy two.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: One of the best purchases. especially if you have an electric kettle
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases. especially if you have an electric kettle. Put under the covers 30 min before going to bed and your bed will be warm. Doesn't keep your bed to hot like electric blankets and you can put it aside if it ever does. love this item
customer_reviews.author: Amazoncustomer

customer_reviews.title: Fair price but not flawless
customer_reviews.text: Fair purchase but not flawless. It is good for the price but there are two issues. One, the bag itself seems well-made but the cover does not seem durable. I doubt if it can survive 2 times of washing. Most likely the cover is stretched and become lose after the wash. The second issue is that the bag is not that rectangular and tend to be a square. This makes it more inflated when filled with water than similar hot water bags. The base of the bag is wide and you feel like you are hugging a cube than a rectangular pillow. This makes its using hard.
customer_reviews.author: Nima

customer_reviews.title: replacement for a heating pad
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use on a cruise but haven't needed it yet. Cruise lines take your heating pads ( you get it back at the end of the cruise) Will update how it worked out if I need it. It is cute and came in my favorite color!
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Great...except you have to hang it upright, and it can't drain.
customer_reviews.text: Great water bottle. The little sweater prevents it from burning the skin and also keeps it hot for longer. The only downside is that the hole for hanging up the bottle is on the neck. I'm accustomed to hanging it upside-down, such that any remaining water can drip out and prevent mold. If they punched a hole in the bottom flap, this would be the perfect hot water bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Life Saver!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hot water bottle has been a life saver! I have two and i'm thinking about getting at least one more. This is the only thing that helps me when I have sore muscles. I also love the fact that it comes in multiple colors but the only thing that is a con for me in my opinion is that obviously depending on where you have it you can't move to much (like if you had it on your back).
customer_reviews.author: Shanelle Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today and im already loving this! My husband has been dealing with terrible back pain for the last few weeks, and this is big enough to cover the specific area and stays hot long enough for some much needed relief.
customer_reviews.author: Donica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for pain relief
customer_reviews.text: I pulled a muscle a while back and my doctor recommended hot and cold therapy, which is why I purchased this bottle. The material is thick and the lid closes just fine, I haven't experienced any leaks. It also gets hot once the water is inside and stays warm for a long time (overnight). Now that my muscle is healed, my wife uses it for period cramps. She is very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: R.D.

product_meta.title: Attmu Classic Rubber Transparent Hot Water Bottle 2 Liter with Knit Cover - Blue
feature_bullets: MULTI FUNCTIONAL HOT WATER BOTTLE: This hot pack made of thermoplastic material that is recyclable. Advanced thermoplastic holds heat longer than traditional hot water bottles with cover, also works as an ice pack, or cold water bottle. But please CAUTION: The hot water bottle rubber is not suitable for Microwave oven heating.

EASY TO USE- This hot water bag for pain relief with wide mouth is easy to fill and the anti spurt lip prevent water spitting back out like those old rubber ones. Fill only to two-thirds capacity maximum. It's transparent. No more guesswork about how much hot water is inside.
HELPFUL ASSISTANT- The classic design of this classic home remedy. Treating sore muscles, stress or arthritis, aches and pains, stiff necks, lower back pain, and other common aches.

CARE INSTRUCTION- Grid texture makes skin contact safer and more comfortable. Comes with an elegant knitted hot water bag cover to prevent the hot rubber from being in direct contact with your skin to cause burns, plus it has a more classy and personalized look. The hot water bottle rubber should be replaced after two years of use. And check stopper for wear and tear damage at regular intervals.
AFTER-SALE SERVICE: We are so confident with the quality of our product. But if you don't completely satisfied with this product for any reason, please feel free to ask us at any time!

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
